listitem.para: Whether requests of the remote peer to redirect IKE/IPsec SA's during IKE_AUTH are accepted. Valid options are no (the default) and yes. See also redirect-to= and the config setup global-redirect and global-redirect-to options. Runtime redirects can be triggered via the ipsec whack --redirect command.

Whether to send requests for the remote peer to redirect IKE/IPsec SA's during IKE_AUTH. Valid options are no (the default) and yes. If set, the option redirect-to= must also be set to indicate where to redirect peers to.
Where to send remote peers to via the send-redirect option. This can be an IP address or hostname (FQDN).
